bug.author: JamesTang-616
bug.summary: index type error in reduce code
bug.description:
Describe the bug While running reduce code in /jina/executors/encoders/numeric/helper.py, the num_tokens in function prune_mask turns out to be a decimal, which causes the issue: <denchmark-code>IndexError: only integers, slices (`:`), ellipsis (`...`), numpy.newaxis (`None`) and integer or boolean arrays are valid indices**Describe how you solve it**<!-- copy past your code/pull request link --> </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>change the type of num_tokens to integer by using int()</denchmark-h>
Environment jina 0.5.0 jina-proto 0.0.58 jina-vcs-tag (unset) libzmq 4.2.5 pyzmq 1.19.1 protobuf 3.9.2 proto-backend cpp grpcio 1.31.0 ruamel.yaml 0.16.10 python 3.7.6 platform Linux platform-release 5.4.0-42-generic platform-version <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/issues/46>#46</denchmark-link> -Ubuntu SMP Fri Jul 10 00:24:02 UTC 2020 architecture x86_64 processor x86_64 jina-resources /home/jamestang/.pyenv/versions/3.7.6/lib/python3.7/site-packages/jina/resources JINA_ARRAY_QUANT (unset) JINA_CONTRIB_MODULE (unset) JINA_CONTRIB_MODULE_IS_LOADING(unset) JINA_CONTROL_PORT (unset) JINA_DEFAULT_HOST (unset) JINA_EXECUTOR_WORKDIR (unset) JINA_FULL_CLI (unset) JINA_IPC_SOCK_TMP (unset) JINA_LOG_FILE (unset) JINA_LOG_LONG (unset) JINA_LOG_NO_COLOR (unset) JINA_LOG_PROFILING (unset) JINA_LOG_SSE (unset) JINA_LOG_VERBOSITY (unset) JINA_POD_NAME (unset) JINA_PROFILING (unset) JINA_SOCKET_HWM (unset) JINA_STACK_CONFIG (unset) JINA_TEST_CONTAINER (unset) JINA_TEST_GPU (unset) JINA_TEST_PRETRAINED (unset) JINA_TEST_FAISS (unset) JINA_VCS_VERSION (unset) JINA_VERSION (unset) JINA_WARN_UNNAMED (unset) JINA_BINARY_DELIMITER (unset) JINA_DISABLE_UVLOOP (unset) Screenshots â”†Issue is synchronized with this <denchmark-link:https://jinaai.atlassian.net/browse/JINACORE-208>Jira Task</denchmark-link> by <denchmark-link:https://www.unito.io/learn-more>Unito</denchmark-link>
